data.lyric:
[ti:when the party's over]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:when the party's over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]when the party's over - Billie Eilish
[00:05.86]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:11.73]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:17.60]Don't you know I'm no good for you
[00:25.78]I've learned to lose you can't afford to
[00:34.83]Tore my shirt to stop you bleeding
[00:42.92]But nothing ever stops you leaving
[00:52.15]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[00:59.22]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[01:06.56]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[01:16.71]Don't you know too much already
[01:24.61]I'll only hurt you if you let me
[01:33.81]Call me friend but keep me closer
[01:41.84]And I'll call you when the party's over
[01:51.10]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[01:58.17]And I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:05.41]Yeah I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:12.42]But nothing is better sometimes
[02:18.56]Once we both said our goodbyes
[02:25.59]Let's just let it go
[02:31.31]Let me let you go
[02:40.47]Quiet when I'm coming home I'm on my own
[02:48.60]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
[02:57.27]I could lie and say I like it like that like it like that
data.trans:
[ti:when the party's over]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:when the party's over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.86]//
[00:11.73]//
[00:17.60]难道你还不明白我并非你的良配？
[00:25.78]我努力学着将你遗忘脑海 即便我无法承受这样的结局
[00:34.83]撕毁自己的衣服只为包扎你鲜血直流的伤口
[00:42.92]但什么都无法阻止你决绝离开的脚步
[00:52.15]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[00:59.22]我就这样自欺欺人 我就享受这样的生活
[01:06.56]我就这样自欺欺人 我就喜欢这样的生活
[01:16.71]难道你没意识到已经太多次了
[01:24.61]我怎会伤你分毫
[01:33.81]唤我普通朋友却将我紧拥入怀
[01:41.84]曲终人散时 我会告诉你
[01:51.10]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[01:58.17]我就这样自欺欺人 我就享受这样的生活
[02:05.41]我就这样自欺欺人 我就喜欢这样的生活
[02:12.42]但一切不曾好转 有时候
[02:18.56]如果我们开口互道再见
[02:25.59]就随它吧 随风而逝吧
[02:31.31]让我放手 让你离去吧
[02:40.47]家只有我一个人的身影 悄无声息的安静
[02:48.60]我就这样自欺欺人 我就享受这样的生活
[02:57.27]我就这样自欺欺人 我就喜欢这样的生活
